title: 'Quality is great'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. Amazing quality. Ofcrse Jockey is a big brand and this much is always expected. However its a slight tight on the thighs. Not much though. But if anyone buying this size do keep this in mind if you have bigger thighs and small waist. I took the M size and it fits perfectly on the waist as its elastic and stretchable too. So dont worry about the fitting from waist. I have attached a reference video of myself wearing it. Would be of great help for people of my height 5.10 weight 80kg and waist between 32-34. And received it on time by Amazon. The service is top notch always.'

title: 'Sizing & Quality Issue'

title: 'Excellent Quality - Go buy it'

title: 'Good quality but needs ironing'
body: 'It is very comfortable to wear and looks good on me. The quality of tailoring and cloth is quite good. But my complaint is it required ironing after every use. Will I buy again? Probably no. Only because I am a minimalist and prefer products which require less maintenance. As such I use very few products so need them to be excellent not just very good.'
